CustomField.description: Computed age of mother from the date of birth.
CustomField.formula: IF( MONTH(TODAY())>MONTH(Mother_s_Date_Of_Birth__c), YEAR(TODAY())-YEAR(Mother_s_Date_Of_Birth__c), IF(AND(MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH(Mother_s_Date_Of_Birth__c), DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY(Mother_s_Date_Of_Birth__c)), YEAR(TODAY())-YEAR(Mother_s_Date_Of_Birth__c), (YEAR(TODAY())-YEAR( Mother_s_Date_Of_Birth__c ))-1) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Computed age of mother from the date of birth.
CustomField.label: Mother's Age
